channel.title: BakkesMod Programming Wiki
channel.description: Recent content on BakkesMod Programming Wiki

item.title: CameraSave
item.description:
View Implementation Two of the saved camera settings. Get from SettingsWrapper.GetCameraSaveSettings() bool  InvertSwivelPitch Default value: none
bool  CameraShake Default value: none

item.title: ClubColorSet
item.description:
View Implementation IDs of colors used by a team in a club match. TODO: Figure out and note what the mapping from ID to color is. Get from CustomMatchTeamSettings.Colors unsigned char  TeamColorID Default value = 0
unsigned char  CustomColorID Default value = 0
bool  bTeamColorSet Default value = false
bool  bCustomColorSet Default value = false

item.title: ControllerInput
item.description:
View Implementation A controller's input at a single frame. Easy access with CarWrapper.GetInput() float  Throttle Default value = .0f
float  Steer Default value = .0f
float  Pitch Default value = .0f
float  Yaw Default value = .0f
float  Roll Default value = .

item.title: CustomMatchSettings
item.description:
View Implementation Use to create a private match with MatchmakingWrapper.CreatePrivateMatch() std::string  GameTags Default value: none
std::string  MapName Default value: none
std::string  ServerName Default value: none
std::string  Password Default value: none
CustomMatchTeamSettings BlueTeamSettings Default value: none
CustomMatchTeamSettings OrangeTeamSettings Default value: none

item.title: CustomMatchTeamSettings
item.description:
View Implementation A single team's setting. Get from a CustomMatchSettings std::string  Name Default value: none
ClubColorSet Colors Default value: none
int  GameScore Default value = 0

item.title: GamepadSettings
item.description:
View Implementation A read-only copy of a player's gamepad settings. Get with SettingsWrapper.GetGamepadSettings() float  ControllerDeadzone Default value: none
float  DodgeInputThreshold Default value: none
float  SteeringSensitivity Default value: none
float  AirControlSensitivity Default value: none

item.title: GUIDWrapper
item.description:
View Implementation Wraps a read-only copy of a GUI menu's ID. Not 100% sure on the use case EGuidFormats Digits = 0 DigitsWithHyphens = 1 DigitsWithHyphensInBraces = 2 DigitsWithHyphensInParentheses = 3 HexValuesInBraces = 4 UniqueObjectGuid = 5
int32_t A Default value: none

item.title: LinearColor
item.description:
View Implementation RGBA value to change the color of the Canvas. Values from 0.0-1.0 for each with 1 being 100% intensity. A is for alpha and is opacity. A = 1.0 will be fully opaque float  R Default value: none
float  G Default value: none
float  B Default value: none

item.title: MMRNotifierToken
item.description: View Implementation Unique value assigned to an mmr notifier for a specific player. Obtain with MMRWrapper.RegisterMMRNotifier() unsigned long long  token Default value: none

item.title: POV
item.description:
View Implementation The location, rotation, and FOV of a player's POV Vector location Default value: none
Rotator rotation Default value: none
float  FOV Default value: none

item.title: PredictionInfo
item.description:
View Implementation Info on the predicted location of a ball. Get with BallWrapper.PredictPosition() float  Time Default value: none
float  ArchTopTime Default value: none
Vector Location Default value: none
Vector Velocity Default value: none
Vector ArchTop Default value: none
Vector ArchTopVelocity Default value: none

item.title: ProfileCameraSettings
item.description:
View Implementation A player's camera Settings. Access with CameraWrapper.GetCameraSettings() float  FOV Default value: none
float  Height Default value: none
float  Pitch Default value: none
float  Distance Default value: none
float  Stiffness Default value: none
float  SwivelSpeed Default value: none

item.title: Quat
item.description:
View Implementation A description of a 4D space. Just trust it works and don't think too hard. Used RotatorToQuat and RotateVectorWithQuat to rotate a vector in 3D space using a Rotator and Quat float  X Default value: none
float  Y Default value: none
float  Z Default value: none
float  W Default value: none

item.title: RBState
item.description:
View Implementation Quat Quaternion Default value: none
Vector Location Default value: none
Vector LinearVelocity Default value: none
Vector AngularVelocity Default value: none
float  Time Default value: none
unsigned long  bSleeping Default value: none
unsigned long  bNewData Default value: none

item.title: RecordedSample
item.description:
View Implementation A single sample of data recorded for performance graphs. Get with SampleHistoryWrapper float  Low Default value: none
float  High Default value: none

item.title: ReplayScoreData
item.description:
View Implementation Stats shown in a replay. Get with ReplayDirectorWrapper.GetReplayScoreData() uintptr_t ScoredBy Default value: none
uintptr_t AssistedBy Default value: none
float  Speed Default value: none
float  Time Default value: none
unsigned char  ScoreTeam Default value: none

item.title: Rotator
item.description:
View Implementation A description of the orientation of an object. This github page describes what 3D space is in Rocket League  int  Pitch Default value: none
int  Yaw Default value: none
int  Roll Default value: none

item.title: SkillRank
item.description:
View Implementation Information on a player's rank. From MMRWrapper.GetPlayerRank() int  Tier Default value: none
int  Division Default value: none
int  MatchesPlayed Default value: none

item.title: SkillRating
item.description:
View Implementation Raw skill data used to calculate MMR with MMRWrapper.CalculateMMR() float  Mu Default value: none
float  Sigma Default value: none

item.title: SteamID
item.description: View Implementation Mostly depreciated. When possible use the epic and steam friendly UniqueIDWrapper unsigned long long  ID Default value: none

item.title: StickyForceData
item.description:
View Implementation Info on stickiness to wall. Get with VehicleWrapper.GetStickyForce() float  Ground Default value: none
float  Wall Default value: none

item.title: UnrealColor
item.description:
View Implementation RGBA stored in 0-255 values for each. A is alpha or opacity. 255 Alpha is max opacity unsigned char  B Default value: none
unsigned char  G Default value: none
unsigned char  R Default value: none
unsigned char  A Default value: none

item.title: Vector
item.description:
View Implementation A 3D vector. This can define a location, direction or a velocity. This github page describes what 3D space is in Rocket League  float  X Default value: none
float  Y Default value: none
float  Z Default value: none

item.title: Vector2
item.description:
View Implementation A 2D vector. This is two ints, and can often be used to describe a location on the screen. (0, 0) is the top left corner. +x is to the right, and +y is down int  X Default value: none
int  Y Default value: none

item.title: Vector2F
item.description:
View Implementation A 2D vector, but x and y are floats float  X Default value: none
float  Y Default value: none

item.title: VideoSettings
item.description:
View Implementation The video settings. Get from SettingsWrapper.GetVideoSettings() bool  bVsync Default value: none
bool  bShowWeatherFX Default value: none
bool  bShowLightShafts Default value: none
bool  bTranslucentArenaShaders Default value: none
bool  bShowLensFlares Default value: none
bool  bEnableHDRSideBySideVisualizer Default value: none

item.title: ViewTarget
item.description:
View Implementation Target of a camera. Target can be wrapped in an ActorWrapper wrappedTarget(((uintptr_t) struct-&gt;Target)) Similarly controller is safe to cast to PlayerControllerWrapper and PRI can be cast to PriWrapper void *  Target Default value: none
void *  Controller Default value: none
POV POV Default value: none
float  AspectRatio Default value: none

item.title: WheelContactData
item.description:
View Implementation Info on a single wheel's contact with stuff. Get with WheelWrapper.GetContact()  unsigned long  bHasContact Default value: none
unsigned long  bHasContactWithWorldGeometry Default value: none
float  HasContactChangeTime Default value: none
void *  Actor Default value: none
void *  Component Default value: none

item.title: WorldContactData
item.description:
View Implementation Info on an actors contact with the world. Get with RBActor.GetWorldContact() unsigned long  bHasContact Default value: none
Vector Location Default value: none
Vector Velocity Default value: none
Vector Normal Default value: none
